description: This file provides environment helper functions for a React application, enabling access to environment variables with fallbacks and parsing feature flags.

methods.name: getEnv(key, fallback = undefined)
methods.description: Retrieves the value of an environment variable with an optional fallback if the variable is undefined, null, or an empty string.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the API base URL from environment variables, checking 'REACT_APP_API_BASE' first, then 'REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL', or null if neither are set.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags()
methods.description: Parses the 'REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS' environment variable as a comma-separated list of feature flags, trims whitespace, and filters out empty entries.
